LabelText: Document the third-party product or service suspected of compromise
Identify systems and applications that rely on the third-party component
Review vendor advisories, CVEs, and official guidance for the suspected compromise
Isolate or disable affected components according to vendor/IR guidance
Collect logs and telemetry from systems using the compromised component
Check for signs of post-compromise activity (new accounts, config changes, outbound traffic)
Apply patches, updates, or alternative solutions as recommended
Notify internal stakeholders and potentially impacted customers as needed
Document vendor interactions, remediation steps, and long-term risk changes
